meanings.sent1: The complex instructions bemuddles the students.
meanings.sent2: Too many choices can bemuddles a person trying to decide.

meanings.sent5: The foggy weather bemuddles the pilot's sense of direction.

meanings.sent1: When tired, my mind bemuddles and I can't focus.
